title: Lady Gaga's epic fall off stage as a fan picks her up and dry-humps her

Lady Gaga went tumbling off the stage in an epic fall after a fan picked her up and dry-humped her.

The pop star and actress - real name Stefani Germanotta - invited a fan to join her on stage during her Las Vegas show last night.

But she probably ended up regretting it.

The enthusiastic male fan quickly scoops Gaga off her feet and wraps her legs around his waist so he can mime having sex with her.

She plays along, holding her arm up in the air, but it quickly goes so wrong.

The eager fan loses his footing as he steps a little too far to one side and falls off the stage, taking Gaga with him.

(Image: ladygaganownet/Twitter)

(Image: ladygaganownet/Twitter)

The spotlight follows them as they come crashing to the ground to gasps of horror from the crowd.

A video of the shocking moment was shared on social media by gossip blogger Perez Hilton, who said: "Lady GaGa invited a fan up on stage with her at her Vegas show on Thursday night and... OOPS!!"

"Ouch," one person commented.

While another joked: "Did he finish or what?"

Gaga, who is performing her Enigma show in Vegas, hasn't commented on the fall, but it seems she handled it like a pro and it's business as usual.

The star, 33, did show off her brutal post-show ritual though.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

In a series of three pictures, she's seen sitting in an ice bath, taking a dip in a hot bath then lying down for a nap in a suit packed with more ice.

She said: "Post show routine: ice bath for 5-10 min, hot bath for 20, then compression suit packed with ice packs for 20."
